titleStmt.title: A sermon concerning vocal and instrumental musick in the church as it was delivered in the parish church of St. Andrew Undershaft, upon the 31th of May, 1696, being Whit-Sunday, and the day wherein the organ there erected was first made use of / by Gabriel Towerson.
titleStmt.author: Towerson, Gabriel, 1635?-1697.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
